website_summaries.verdict: This double sink is expensive, but it's well worth the cost. Installation instructions are great for DIY types, too.
pros: Includes all mounting hardware for installation
cons: Might be too deep to fit in some cabinets

customer_reviews.title: This sink is SUPERB
customer_reviews.text: My granite counter installer recommended this sink to me, and I can’t get over what a great sink it actually is. It is incredibly deep, wellmade, doesn’t show watermarks, cleans well, and shows well. I like to put the dirty dishes in one side and the cleaned dishes to be rinsed in the other. When I’m processing food, I work in one side and food scraps (skins, peels etc) go in the other. The deep wells give me room to move! I paired it with a Kohler Simplice faucet and I have gotten rave compliments on my kitchen. Do not hesitate to get this sink.
customer_reviews.author: silkee

customer_reviews.title: Nice, very functional sink.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the extras that came with the sink. The scratch resistance really helps keep the sink looking new. That is the one thing I hate about stainless steel is that they scratch easily. You will need to dry the sink if you dont want it to show spots, which I do if I have company coming. It came with the 2 stainless steel guards/racks that sit in the sink which I have used to set big pots to dry on. Love this sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After four years, this sink is still excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sink in 2015, and it's the best sink we ever had. The bottom grates protect the finish from scratches, and the bowls are large enough to hold a 10-inch frying pan lying flat on the bottom. When we wash dishes the deep bowls allow using a large amount of water without splashing out. With normal care, the sink still glistens when we wipe it down after use. No scratches, no dents. The heavy steel construction and the sound-deadening pads eliminate the reverberations that many stainles steel sinks produce. If we buy another house, we're certainly going to equip it with this Krause sink. (I didn't install the sink myself, so I can't attest to ease of installation.)
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Grammar

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We are remodeling our kitchen and needed an undermount sink to go under the new granite countertop. Ater reading literally hundreds of reviews about dozens of sinks, I was convinced that this was the one for us. Unfortunately, it arrived late, which has thrown our work schedule off, so the sink sits in place, unconnected, waiting to be used. It does look great, but I can't assess performance in anyway. Will amend this review after it has been installed and I've had a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking; your in the right place.
customer_reviews.text: I am a contractor and have installed them in many homes. Everyone seems very pleased even though they have no idea how it compares to other sinks of it's kind. Superior packaging and the basic sink includes everything needed from the strainer to the grid and everything is very high quality. Other brands seem to just offer a sink at the same price and then have you add all the other stuff adding $125 - $175 to the final cost. If people actually knew anything about stainless steel sinks and what generally comes with them Kraus would put them all out of business. And YES I have installed them in friends and families homes and gotten good feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Also this sink has a dull pattern all over when it comes
customer_reviews.text: Bought scratch/spot coating. Used one day spots everywhere!!! And they won’t come off. Also this sink has a dull pattern all over when it comes. Don’t know if it’s the coating or the way Kraus makes them. Not shiny - but dull and polka dot type pattern. Ruined my kitchen remodel. But it was too late to return, as granite installers next day. DONT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Found this one and went ahead and ordered it because the price was good for a 16ga stainless
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sink in a hurry as my regular supplier was out of double equal undermounts. Found this one and went ahead and ordered it because the price was good for a 16ga stainless. I was very impressed when I received the sink. Packaging was phenomenal, you would have to run over it with a truck to dent it, and the accessories like the dry racks and the included basket strainers with removable strained made this a heck of a deal. The sounded deadening on the bottom is substantial as well, zero "ting" with this sink. It puts $500 teka sinks to shame. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Wente

customer_reviews.title: Love my new sink!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 14 year old black composite sink with this sink and realized I should have done it sooner. Microshield finish is great and worth the extra money. Sink looks good and is easy to clean. Love the stainless steel grates that came with the sink. Best part is how well it is made...solid and quiet...I would not hesitate to recommend this sink to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: PamC

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Sink is thick, sounds are dampened but this sink scratches VERY easily which is a huge disappointment. Surface is rough and not smooth. Overall wish I had selected a different sink for our remodel.
customer_reviews.author: I.M.Amazin

customer_reviews.title: You will be very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sink with the matching faucet. The cost was almost $700 for the pair but we wanted a quality sink. And we were doing a complete kitchen remodel costing tens of thousands of dollars so why skimp on a sink? This one is very nice. Heavy construction. The drain inserts were somewhat cheap looking with plastic parts so I bought all-metal ones and installed them. The sink comes with a heavy grate for each side of the sink, a nice feature. We are very satisfied with this sink.
customer_reviews.author: Ted in Sonora

customer_reviews.title: High Quaily and Deep Stainless Steel Sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is quality through and through. It is well insulated so it does not create noise when you put dishes in the sink. Nothing cheap about this sink. I like the deeper sink. Not sure how I would use the racks for the bottom of the sink, but they are decent quality too. The free towel is OK, but I did not buy a sink for a towel. Get rid of the towel and lower the price by $5!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sink
customer_reviews.text: Sink was a perfect fit for my kitchen project. I like the design on the inside of the sink. The best part is how quite it is. I can barely hear the garbage disposal now. It also comes with the new strainers, gaskets, and the drain pipes were extra long so I did not have to do any extra plumbing.
customer_reviews.author: Harley C Harden

customer_reviews.title: Five-star design and materials
customer_reviews.text: The sink is very solid, no tinny sound or feel, quiets our garbage disposal very well. The finish in the sink is exactly right, sort of a matte finish that hides waterspots between cleanings. Best feature may be the racks -- not only do they protect the sink from dropped items, but the give you a level surface at the bottom of the sink
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Too many scratches after just a few days of usage
customer_reviews.text: It is scratched so easily. Very low quality material. I am going to return it. NEVER BUY his product !
customer_reviews.author: ZJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it starts to rust and i only have it for two months
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty sink
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much at our lake house, I bought one for my primary home. It's really thick. I love the extra deep strainer. The screw holding the drain to the strainer broke but customer service had a new one to me in less than a week. Still give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: A contractor installed this sink two years ago and it has been perfect for my kitchen. It is easy to clean and doesn't scratch easily. Little rust spots have appeared occasionally but they came right out with Barkeepers Friend cleaner. I'd recommend this to anyone who wants a no fuss, but attractive option for their kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: MargeO

customer_reviews.title: Love what I have!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my choice, the 50/50 Double sink is big enough to drop a basin in, deep enough not to make splashes and quite to perform. The company is also very thoughtful to included all the accessories that you need, I especially like the metal grid to elevated and separated the clean and dirty or dry and wet. I would highly recommend this sink for whoever needs to remodel their kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ka Ka

customer_reviews.title: Check your radiuses!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this sink. I did purchase it, received it in 2 days but went to install it and the measurements weren't quite right. The width and Length were good but the radiuses are to small and there was going to be a very noticeable gap between the new sink and the counter top so double check your radius before you buy.This is a great sink, but the original sink cutout is the problem not this: Kraus Outlast MicroShield Scratch-Resist...
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne4kats

customer_reviews.title: Undermount sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful sink which is made with quality. This was a replacement for an enamel sink which was stained and chipped. We needed a under mount sink for our new granite counter tops. Delivery was prompt and the sink was packaged with care by manufacturer. Higher quality than what we could of gotten at our Big chain Home store and was less expensive. It is a high quality sink at a cheap price. You get more than you pay for! My wife was happy with purchase, we saved money and got a great sink. Nice and deep to fit pots and pans.We got extras like the bottom sink racks and a Kraus dish towel. 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adgrand70

customer_reviews.title: OMG THE QUALITY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write long reviews, all I can say is this is AMAZING!!!!! Never looks dirty , the racks in the botton AMAZING looks great with the granite countertop. If you pass on this, you are silly. The price point is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The sink scratches so easily and the sink rack inserts have left a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sink after reading the reviews, and I'm really regretting this purchase. The sink scratches so easily and the sink rack inserts have left a little round circle on the stainless steel. The circles are from the feet on the racks! I called Kraus and they did say I could probably get a replacement but it's an undercounter mount! Now what? I'm stuck with it like a previous reviewer. Anyone know how to remove scratches from stainless steel.....?.
customer_reviews.author: Mauigrl

customer_reviews.title: I really did like it was beautiful but disappointed to not be able ...
customer_reviews.text: I really did like it was beautiful but disappointed to not be able to use the basket with disposal. Maybe I don't need the basket and truthfully probably should be a 5. I did not notice prior to buying it has dots all over it I guess to prevent scratches. I like the metal grates that fit in the bottom of sink.
customer_reviews.author: ann donnelly

customer_reviews.title: ... renovation and befirehand I checked on specs for a excellent sink. What was mentioned was 16 gage
customer_reviews.text: We recently did a renovation and befirehand I checked on specs for a excellent sink. What was mentioned was 16 gage, 300 grade stainless and 16 gage which led me to Kraus. The price was great, the included hardware covered virtually any installation and the racks added a touch of class. I would recommend this sink for anyone however check your drain as the deeper sink can put some disposal setups too low
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Good sink
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this sink in place for a few weeks. It seems to clean up nicely. The textured surface is ok, but it isn't as "pretty" as the satin finished, shiny sinks. I love that it came with the grids to protect the bottom of the sink. I haven't noticed it being noisy either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is very well made and was easy to install. I've been using it for almost 6 months and am very happy with the quality. It cleans easily and isn't prone to scratching which is something I was concerned about when I originally considered stainless steel. I was also very happy that this sink included the strainers. You have two choices as to what you want to install and I went with the removable basket on the non-disposal side. It is great at catching most everything and it's simple to lift out and dump into the trash. I would highly recommend this Kraus sink.
customer_reviews.author: Kidds

customer_reviews.title: Kraus double sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is nice and deep, but you can't sit anything in the bottom without it sliding to the drain. The sink racks are nice but I don't use them because the feet collect gunk and I constantly had to wash them and sanitize them. I finally gave up on that and got rid of them. The sink does stain easily, so I have to wipe it down all of the time. It was also bowed and was very hard to install. I wouldn't recommend this sink.
customer_reviews.author: maryleam

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink!
customer_reviews.text: It is nice looking and the added features of the protective racks, insulation and drain basket are outstanding additions. Has the feel of quality. My countertop installer was very impressed too. He provided options with his products but said this was one of the nicest he had seen. After 2 years, I”m still loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: The individual sinks are a good size and a bit deeper than sinks I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: Just had the sink installed about a month ago as part of a gut kitchen remodel. The individual sinks are a good size and a bit deeper than sinks I've had in the past. I also purchased a larger faucet so I think the depth helps to prevent splash up from the faucet. I don't use the wire sink protectors but I also haven't noticed any scratches. I mounted under mount. I'm not a do it your seller so I can't comment on installation. Really glad I purchased and I found other reviews quite helpful in making my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cheetah

customer_reviews.title: Let them soak
customer_reviews.text: The sink is a quality and versatile product that won't sink your budget. Fairly easy to install and durable, the stainless steel look is timeless and easy to clean. The two separate tubs help make the cleaning process easier to manage. They are deep and wide so you can fit most items in there to help soak the pots and pans and plates. No one likes to do the dishes, but if you have to, roll up your sleeves and use this sink.
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest. It stains and the metal grates plastic feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Not the greatest. It stains and the metal grates plastic feet have left marks on the sink. I waited to do a review to see how it held up and its not the best. I would not purchase this sink again. I could find a better quality at Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Yo Adriane

customer_reviews.title: Quality at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, seems very sturdy. Packaged very well. All parts included. Great instructions. Will update in one year. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: George Eckhardt

customer_reviews.title: Best quality stainless steel sinks!
customer_reviews.text: Best sink ever!! I have been using my double Kraus sink for almost 2 years and there still are no scratches in it. The steel is smooth and glossy after two years. It is heavy gauge steel and the racks in the bottom of the sink help tremendously. Love the look and love the quality! I recently bought two more single Kraus sinks for my basement renovation. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great Amazon Warehouse Deal :)
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy, as a warehouse deal, saved lots of $. Came in pristine mint condition and looks great in our kitchen. Husband doesn't really like the grates though, as silverware can slip underneath them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Big and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink. It is large, has great depth, is beautiful with quality material and it comes with all the desired accessories to keep it beautiful. The thickness is perfect and prevents noise from high powered water hitting the base. The basin racks are fantastic and we love the extra high quality dish towel and spare protectors that came with it. The granite guy liked it so much he got one for his own home. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Myers

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great sink. Packaged very good, cones with the stoppers and drains, 8ncluding a deep one with a built in strainer for catching food that lifts out easily. The other stopper clicks in via ball bearing. Genius! There were some marks in the sink right out if the box. But nothing major (charachter). The included towel is nice for wiping the sink after doing dishes. The baskets are also very nice. Dollar for dollar a great sink.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Peter

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my house aver a year ago. It is sturdy, quiet and looks good. I purchased another for my daughter's house, and it is the same. I highly recommend this Kraus sink.
customer_reviews.author: Chassity Burks

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sink. Built like a tank, but looks great. And the extras add a lot of value. The grates help to keep your sink from getting scratched. The removable catch is very convenient, and the stopper works well and looks good too. Very impressed with the sink and the Kraus faucet too.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. It is everything I thought it would be. Looks greatinstalled below the granite counter top. The accessories make this such a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: stargazer352

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy sink
customer_reviews.text: I had qualms ordering an open box item but it arrived in perfect shape. The box was beat up on the outside but the packing was outstanding, The Krauss sink even came in a giant cloth pouch which can be reused. It is a beautiful heavy stainless steel sink, love how well it is made and the shape.
customer_reviews.author: Nanabanana

customer_reviews.title: Nice,  heavy gage sink.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking sink. It's made out of heavy gage steel, not like some other flimsy ones at the "box" stores. Shipping was fast and it came incredibly well packaged. It does get water spots, as previous reviews states. I wipe it with the towel each time I use it and it still leaves spots. All together I am pretty happy with the sink, spots and all.
customer_reviews.author: douglas macarthur

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink.
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty sink. Beautiful shine. Love the racks to keep dishes from scratching the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: The sink looks really good and I love the accessories
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sink when we got new granite counter tops. The sink looks really good and I love the accessories, especially the racks for each side. The price on Amazon was very good and delivery was quick. It fit very well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: What a great sink. Ordered it for the new kitchen remodel
customer_reviews.text: What a great sink. Ordered it for the new kitchen remodel. Read reviews from other folks and did some research on line. Everyone was right about it being a kick ass sink. Nice and deep. Came with the bottom drain racks, and everything you would need to install this sink. It's a under mount and came with the clips and screws to keep it in place. Exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: BobP

customer_reviews.title: Great sink to go with new granite counter top.
customer_reviews.text: Chrome footed inserts keep sink bottom free from scratches. Really good quality and attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie L

customer_reviews.title: Kraus Outlast MicroShield Scratch-Resist Stainless Steel Undermount 50/50 Double Bowl Sink
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality product...It isn't entirely scratch resistant, because nothing is. Easy to clean, somewhat, takes a little more effort due to the dimples on the bottom of the stainless. The 16 gauge stainless and rigid and quiet. It's an outstanding sink. I installed it nearly two years ago and it still looks wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great sink for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sink for the price, it came packaged well and has now been in our house for over a year and there is 0 scratches or signs of wear. Easy to clean and looks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this sink. It's beautiful, reasonably priced on Amazon, and the company provides excellent customer service. I got this excellent 16 gauge sink for the price of an 18 gauge from other vendors! Go figure. The sink arrived quickly and safely. The accessories are an added and welcomed bonus. Love the sound suppression coating also! I will definitely use Kraus again!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product .
customer_reviews.text: Hi Quality sink , looks great . packaged very well ... they even have the sink inside a cloth bag to save it from getting scratched .... plus other good packing materials . Very happy with this purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Steven Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high quality. I liked it so much, I bought two. Well, that's actually because my counter top guys let it blow out of the back of their truck and it got run over by an 18 wheeler! But it is twice the sink over the thinner contractor grade they wanted to give me. Even the surface finish screams high quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink. Installation a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: Love love the sink. Plumber installed easily. Everything he needed was in the box. It is beautiful. Love the basket which catches food (I don’t have a garbage disposal) and the drains and racks. Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Ddgrif

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sink For My Remodeled Kitchen...
customer_reviews.text: - Packed carefully for shipping; and delivered on time - Excellent appearance - Excellent quality - Great price - Beware that drain holes are not centered in sink, rather shifted a bit rearward for good reason; therefore make sure your under-sink has appropriate room/plumming to handle the offset, especially with under-sink disposal - it works well for me
customer_reviews.author: Aladdin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sink...Quality looks good.
customer_reviews.text: The sink arrived in a timely manner and has been put into our new granite countertop. However, we haven't hooked up the plumbing yet. There is some tile work on the backsplash that has to be completed first. The sink is heavier gauge stainless than most and it has some black "sound deadening" coating on the underside. The 2 included drains and grids for the sink bottom are a nice touch. I don't know how useful the towel they included will be. I'll do an update after the plumbing is installed.
customer_reviews.author: GrannieB

customer_reviews.title: Best sink I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this in my new home. It is the best sink that I have had. I live the deep catch basket. We live in the country and can’t have a garbage disposal this is a great solution. The extra thick steel and insulation are evident in using it. Sounds silly but you can feel and hear the quality.
customer_reviews.author: JThompson

customer_reviews.title: I love my sink.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this sink. I love the design and deep size. It came with everything that was needed to mount this under the countertop. The protecting grids that fit in the sinks are great, you can use them as drainers to dry your dishes. I thank the engineers and designers. Thank you. PS> It was also packed as though it was "The Crown Jewels" !.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Hicks

customer_reviews.title: for the price, amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, large sink. Fits large skillets in both sides if necessary. would have given 5 stars, but it did scratch a bit easier than I had anticipated with 16 gauge stainless steel. However, these are not deep scratches, and I can live with them. Afterall, it is a kitchen sink! For the price it's amazing. Saw this same sink online for 30% more in several places!
customer_reviews.author: Kandinsky

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate on this SS sink it is a very heavy gage and well worth the money! as for the past reviews about rust?? I have not seen any signs of rust as well as I have never seen SS rust and i have been in the restaurant biz for 25years!
customer_reviews.author: Spark

customer_reviews.title: Heavy gauge stainless and excellent finish
customer_reviews.text: This is one high quality item. I am pleased with the finish and overall look and feel of this sink. There are 2 protective stainless wire protective racks with rubber legs that came with it as well as both stainless strainer baskets with tailpiece extensions which I would have had to buy separately in the $100.00 range if they were not included. A nice surprise!!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Aylward

customer_reviews.title: great sink with "freebies"
customer_reviews.text: Great sink. Heavy gauge steel that does not vibrate when using the garbage disposal. Our old sink would vibrate shaking things off the counter's edge when the disposal was on. This sink was sold as a package with free sink grates and towel.The free sink grates seemed a little weird at first but have turned out to be a favorite. I keep them in the sink all the time. The sink drains are deep making it easier to clean. The garbage disposal side is great but the other side of sink drain comes with a little "bucket strainer" that pulls out and catches everything unlike the typical drain basket. This is a great sink. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AjR

customer_reviews.title: Sink is very attractive and bottom screens are very nice. I would look at this brand or sink ...
customer_reviews.text: Sink is very attractive and bottom screens are very nice. I would look at this brand or sink again for sure. we are very satisfied with the build quality and the look is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: jmoar

customer_reviews.title: High-end, unique sink
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful, capacious sink. It is textured stainless, more of a matte finish. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen P

customer_reviews.title: See and feel the quality
customer_reviews.text: After turning out builders $1000 sink down when we spec our new home. My wife and I new we could do better at much lower cost. search all the big box stores but none still had the traditional 50/50 bowl and all were thinner wall thickness. We found this sink and read the reviews and at first we were skeptical...all 5 star reviews without any complaints...well every one was right. You can see and feel the quality of this sink. Starting with the packaging...Kraus if you are reading don't change a thing. The sink is solid and the strainers are great. you will not be disappointed with this sink.
customer_reviews.author: CMonteith

customer_reviews.title: Indestructinle but not pretty
customer_reviews.text: This sink is practically indestructible. However I don't like the scratch resistant finish. I couldn't tell on line how it actually looked. It was too late to change by the time I got it so I live with it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Glanville

customer_reviews.title: Love that the grids were included
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, especially with the grids that help keep scratches away.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy K.

customer_reviews.title: We love this sink
customer_reviews.text: We love this sink. Nice and deep for large dishes and pans. Appreciate that it came with all of the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: JWill55

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this sink! The racks and the cup that collects food so they don't go down the drain are genius. Don't over think it. You will love it! Our plumber commented on how nice of a sink it was.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Good sink
customer_reviews.text: Love my new sink. Everything installed easily. Four stars is for the plastic drain parts.
customer_reviews.author: Christinagirl

customer_reviews.title: ... is of high quality and I am certainly very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The sink is of high quality and I am certainly very pleased with this purchase. The included racks, which I thought I wouldn't use, are very useful in keeping the sink pristine, I have found. The finish is easily maintained and stays glowing with a wet, soapy rag, rinsed, and wiped with a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Ludwig von Mises

customer_reviews.title: Solid, beautiful, great value.
customer_reviews.text: We most had this sink installed, under mounted on our quartz countertops. We love the look, the heavy duty feel, and the depth. The plumber remarked that Krauss sinks were great quality, and I feel like we got a top quality sink for half the cost of the others we looked at.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hiltner

customer_reviews.title: Great Sink
customer_reviews.text: Purchase sink for new granite counter installation. Determing factor was the Kraus sink is a heavier guage Stainless Steel than the ones sold by the local big box stores. When the sink arrived, I was impresses with its total quality. Moved to a new home and getting ready to put in new granite counter and I will order from this supplier and this manufacturer of sink again. Price was competitive with big box stores, free shipping and not sales tax made it a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: DAN D

customer_reviews.title: Super quality in this sink
customer_reviews.text: Sink was packed like a fragile antique (great packing) came with all the extras and seems to be a beautiful quality item for a fraction of the cost of other high end sinks. We had it installed last week and we love it. This is a big sink but we had the room for it so no need for us to skimp on a small one. The locale plumbing store wanted a $1000 for a comparable sink and it did not include anything but the sink.
customer_reviews.author: William Mark

customer_reviews.title: I am a general contractor this is one of finest SS sinks I have ever installed
customer_reviews.text: I am a general contractor this is one of finest SS sinks I have ever installed. And at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just completed our kitchen remodel and are so happy with our purchase of this sink!!! It's Gorgeous! My granite installers even commented on how nice it was!! I would Highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: first tenneesee

customer_reviews.title: Came with a big scratch
customer_reviews.text: The sink comes packed very well (wrapped in a nice, black canvas bag) and secured in a box. I unpacked it in my living room which has carpet. I was very careful unpacking it and the first thing I noticed was a big scratch on the divider between the sinks. See attached picture. I am returning the sink today. I am however rating it a 2 because it is a beautiful, heavy sink otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. It is a tad deeper than the sink it replaced, which is nice. Super easy install - even granite installers (they did sink install, not me) asked about my sink and were impressed with quality and price. Really like the long food catcher sink stopper that came with the sink. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shoeshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink! Looks gorgeous and easy to clean! The countertop installer was ao happy we chose this sink, he recommends this brand to all his clients because the quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Reacts and Rusts
customer_reviews.text: Installed for 1 month and it is already rusting. It reacts with the silverware and leaves rust marks. Not much you can do after you put 400 pounds of granite on top of it. Thanks Amajunk. Save yourself alot of money and have a reputible shop that installs your granite get your sink, then you at least have someone to replace it if there is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SS Sink
customer_reviews.text: The Kraus undermount arrived quickly and undamaged in sturdy packaging. The sound proofing eliminates any drumming noise and the included drains and fittings were a nice touch. 16 gauge is definitely the way to go as 18 is too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: MGA MKII

customer_reviews.title: This is a good looking, well made sink
customer_reviews.text: I buy and sell houses. This is the second sink I have bought from Kraus, and will buy again as need arises. This is a good looking, well made sink, and surprisingly comes with nice sink grids, as well as strainers. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Wareco

customer_reviews.title: Kraus SS sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is awesome! It's a top notch quality sink and it was packaged perfectly to arrive safely to our home. Thanks Kraus for a great sink and thanks Amazon for getting it to us.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Buy it  - you'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great sink for the price - all the extras were an added savings and bonus. Don't hesitate to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheaters Never Prosper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!  YOU CAN'T GET ANYTHING LIKE IT AT LOWES, HOME DEPOT, ETC.!
customer_reviews.text: Very wide and deep sinks! The stainless steel is extra think so you won't get any "clanging" when you place your dishes into it. Comes also with two wire sink mats so your dishes do not sink directly on the bottom (to easily rust!). Very professional looking sink!! A GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this sink but beware that the scratch resistant ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sink but beware that the scratch resistant finish on this will make it a little harder to keep clean. Food particles tend to catch on the non-smooth surface and it takes a little more scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: JustColoring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a first class sink all the way. It came with stainless grills for the bottom of the sink. A black towel with a "K" on it. It was packaged in a very large bag that I can use for something else. I was very impressed with the quality in the product and the packing. Sink was heavy duty. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very high quality stainless steel with all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality stainless steel with all the necessary accessories included. You cannot find this quality in big box stores where you will pay much more for less (at least in our area). After a lot of research. I decided on this brand and this sink and I could not be more pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful, easy to take care of and goes great ...
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful, easy to take care of and goes great with the decor in our kitchen. I apologize for my first review. I thought I was rating a toy we bought for our grandchild.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: So far, so GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, cleans well, very satisfied so far! Very quiet when the water is running, and love the strainers--easy to clean out. Only issue I see is it does get water spots quite a bit as others complained about, but I expect that--it's a sink!! Too soon to give it five stars, but overall very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Flick

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely agree with the other comments associated with this sink - sturdy, great quality, great look. However, in my opinion, the best part of the sink is the super deep removable strainer that sits below the drain stopper. I can fill the sink up with water, do the dishes, etc. and when it comes time to drain the dish water I can simply yank the stopper out and not worry about little chunks of food slipping by the strainer. When it's time to clean the strainer, there's a little handle that makes pulling it out easy. It seems like a minor feature - but I wouldn't give it up at this point!
customer_reviews.author: C. Knutson

customer_reviews.title: As in all Kraus products well worth the money. ...
customer_reviews.text: As in all Kraus products well worth the money. This is the second one I bought. After the first one I didn't even think twice one the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Docman

customer_reviews.title: Good price - good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made sink since it is 16 gauge. I love the stainless steel grids that fit in the bottom of the basins. I've had it three months now and the only downside is the water spots that accumulate on the sides. Keeping it clean helps with that though.
customer_reviews.author: 10uslove

customer_reviews.title: Glad to made a decision to go with this sink
customer_reviews.text: Glad to made a decision to go with this sink. Very well built and very quite when the water hits the sink. A must have in any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kavon P

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, real life scratch resistance
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, real life scratch resistance, quiet even when water is pouring in from a significant height. All about this sink exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Uzi Baron

customer_reviews.title: Worth way beyond it's price
customer_reviews.text: Contractor couldn't believe the high quality and weight of this sink
customer_reviews.author: Borzoi50

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this new sink. My countertop guys said this was the nicest sink they had seen in a long time. It has been in use, and is still cleaning up very nicely, with still a shine on it. Well worth the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect depth (8"); great textured surface
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to conceal light scratches! The textured surface makes the sink look impeccable. It's also deep enough to contain large pots but not too deep: I hate bending over the sink and this 8" depth is perfect to reach the bottom without breaking your back.
customer_reviews.author: Nath

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This came immaculately packaged. It came with the drains, and meshes for the bottom to protect it, if you want to use them. Also a Cleaning pad. installer was impressed with the quality, and was surprised to see how much I paid. the sound dampening material underneath helps make it not have the tingy stainless sound. Looks great, and is classy in the new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: C. Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: Sink is very nice quality and heavy. Basket strainers that come with it were useless to be because of the size of them, but that wasn’t a major issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ben H.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink. Love the racks that come with it. Easily installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it as it is so solid and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This sink is more durable than sinks usually sold at Home Depot or the likes. We love it as it is so solid and roomy!
customer_reviews.author: Anne L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing this sink and it is a beauty! Solidly built and great accessories and packaging! Good bang for the buck! Comes with extra "grate" protectors. Wonderful touch to our newly renovated kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: RudeDog

product_meta.title: Kraus KBU22 32 inch Undermount 50/50 Double Bowl 16 gauge Stainless Steel Kitchen Sink
product_meta.description:
Color:Stainless Steel

Kraus undermount stainless steel sinks are designed with your kitchen in mind. Constructed from premium 16 or 18 gauge T-304 stainless steel for maximum durability, the extra-deep basins accommodate large dishes with ease. All Kraus kitchen sinks are equipped with top-level soundproofing, including thick rubber dampening pads. Each sink is additionally treated with protective Stone Guard coating, which reduces condensation and further dampens sound. The corrosion-resistant surface is further protected from rust and oxidation by a meticulous finishing process. Commercial-grade satin finish and gently rounded corners make maintenance as simple as wiping the surface with a damp cloth. Equally at home in a transitional and modern kitchen, this double bowl sink provides a lifetime of functionality. The 50/50 split basin adds flexibility for a variety of kitchen tasks. For added convenience, the sink comes with dual stainless steel bottom grids, a basket strainer, and a drain assembly, included free with purchase. Each bottom grid is cushioned by soft protective bumpers to prevent scratching. For easy installation, all mounting hardware is provided. Experience Kraus Quality and bring your best kitchen ideas to life.

Benefits & Features

 * Non-Porous Corrosion-Resistant Surface
 * Commercial-Grade Satin Finish
 * Scratch and Stain-Resistant
 * Extra-Deep Double Bowl Design
 * Standard 3.5" Drain Opening
 * Gently Rounded Corners for Easy Maintenance
 * All Mounting Hardware Included
 * Limited Lifetime Warranty
 * Certified and Listed by UPC, cUPC, IPC, ANSI, IAPMO, and SCC
 * installation type: Undermount
 * sink cutout template: included
 * minimum cabinet size: 36 in
 * basin split: 50/50 in
 * sink length: 32.25 in
 * sink depth: 8.5 in
 * drain opening: 3.5 in
 * drain position: Rear



FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Kraus is a leading kitchen sink manufacturer, with a wide range of products made with advanced technology to exceed industry standards. To ensure exceptional quality, Kraus products are always made with premium materials as well as cutting-edge designs. All Kraus products are created with an eye for fashion as well as function, with an emphasis on quality craftsmanship and functional design. The focus is always on providing outstanding value to all Kraus customers, and making it affordable to create a kitchen they love.

""Love this sink! I bought this sink from Amazon about a year ago and it has been a great addition to our kitchen. It is large enough to soak our largest roasting pan. It is a workhorse. Made extremely well. The sound proofing construction dulls the echoing type sound that most stainless steel sinks have. MONEY WELL SPENT!""
feature_bullets: EXTRA-TOUGH CONSTRUCTION: Dent-resistant T304 stainless steel in TRU16 real 16-gauge (always 1.5mm thick) for superior strength and durability
COMMERCIAL GRADE SATIN FINISH is corrosion and rust-resistant; easily wipes clean
QUIETEST SINK: NoiseDefend soundproofing technology features extra-thick pads covering over 80% of the sink and non-toxic undercoating for added insulation

FREE ACCESSORIES: Protective stainless steel bottom grids (x2), premium 3 piece basket strainer set, drain assembly with strainer, Kraus kitchen towel, mounting hardware, cutout template – LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY and customer service that puts you first
Outer Sink Dimensions: 32 1/4” L x 18” W x 8 1/2” D Min. Cabinet Size: 36”
